notes: [Improved] The “Publishing articles to Apple News” task now logs a message before posting articles, making it easier to track down problem entries.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where `AppleNewsHelper::html2Components()` could set the wrong default `role` property on components where a role wasn’t explicitly set.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where AppleNewsHelper::formatLanguage() was not placing an underscore between the language and region codes.
